item.description:
The NH Liberty Alliance is holding a training session for candidates for NH House of Representatives on Saturday, May 1st, at 1:00 PM. The session is hosted by former NH House Rep. and 2000 Libertarian Party candidate for US President, Don Gorman. Details are on the NH Liberty Alliance calendar:
http://forum.nhlibert...

WHAT: Training for candidates for NH State Rep
WHEN: Saturday, May 1st, 1:00 PM
WHERE: Murphy's Taproom, 494 Elm St., Manchester [ Map ]
COST: $10

This is the 3rd training session for candidates for NH State Rep.
Who are you running against? What are the best strategies to win? This will be an intensive, personalized session. Attendees will get tips, training, and role-play tailored to your winning in your specific district and your specific electoral situation.

This training is also aimed at ensuring you have the greatest possible influence in the State House after you get elected -- you won't be just one more vote out of 400, you'll be part of a team setting the agenda for the State of NH going forward.

Business attire is strictly required -- suit & tie for men, business dress for women. You want to win your election? You want to have the most pro-liberty influence once you get elected? You need to be comfortable talking issues & debating in formal attire.
item.name: Campaign Training for NH Candidates
